attributes.action: Host a snap general election as soon as possible.
attributes.additional_details:
The British public is becoming increasingly frustrated with the lack of clarity being shown by the government with respect to coronavirus.

We are on a course to destroy our economy with more restrictions and would like the chance to see whether the British people want to take alternative action to what the current government in insisting on.
attributes.background: Host a snap general election with immediate effect giving the public the ability to voice their confidence in government policy.
